1712959674.0887864.sceneDescription: Someone is unwrapping and placing two slices of bread on a wooden surface, likely preparing to make a sandwich or toast. The bread is taken out of a plastic wrapper that has a blue "Gluten Free" label, indicating it is a gluten-free product.

1712959686.2419164.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, two slices of bread are shown on a wooden surface, and then a container of Nuttelex Original, which is a brand of plant-based butter alternative, is brought into the frame and spread onto the slices of bread. It appears someone is preparing to make a sandwich or buttered toast.

1712959699.9410086.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, two slices of bread are being buttered on a wooden surface. A person is using a knife to spread butter on the bread, starting with one slice and then moving to the other.

1712959714.2601736.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, a person is buttering two slices of bread with a spread, probably butter or soft cheese. The spreading is done evenly, covering each slice thoroughly before they move on to the next.

1712959730.6603277.sceneDescription: A person is holding a jar of homemade mixed berry jam with a festive ribbon, likely preparing to spread it on two slices of bread laid out on a wooden board. Over the course of the given frames, the jar is moved towards the bread, indicating that the person is about to apply the jam.

1712959747.675078.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is preparing a slice of bread by first spreading what appears to be butter or cream cheese on it, followed by adding a layer of jam or jelly. The person is using a knife to spread the substances over one of the bread slices.

1712959759.7799673.sceneDescription: The images depict the process of someone spreading jam on a slice of bread that already has some butter or spread on it. The person is using a knife to apply and spread the jam evenly over the bread.

1712959771.2163055.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading jam on a piece of bread. They hold the bread steady with one hand while applying the jam with a knife in the other hand.

1712959786.4752507.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, two slices of bread are being prepared with spreads—one with a white, possibly creamy spread and the other with a red, likely fruit jam. The bread slices are then pressed together to make a sandwich and taken out of the frame.

1712959806.807574.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is cutting a slice of bread into four triangles. They then seem to prepare to remove the triangles as a plate is brought into view.

1712959816.7108285.sceneDescription: In the video segment, a person is repeatedly cutting a sandwich into smaller pieces and then stacking them back together on the plate. The cutting and stacking process is creating progressively smaller sandwich triangles.

1712959838.4493506.sceneDescription: A person is arranging sliced pieces of toast with a spread, possibly jam, on a polka-dotted plate. They first position the toast in different orientations before deciding on a final placement for presentation.
